mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_no, c.name AS category_name, m.menu_name, m.menu_price, m.menu_Status FROM menu m inner join categories c on c.categories_no = m.categories_no where m.categories_no = #{categoriesNo} and c.store_no = #{storeNo} and m.soft_delete = 'N' ORDER BY m.menu_status asc, m.position asc
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU set menu_status = CASE WHEN menu_status = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WHERE menu_no = #{menuNo} and soft_delete = 'N'
